title: 13 "The Blood Rain of the One Hundred Foxes of Shinshu - Part III"(Japanese:「埃及大王呪術地獄」〜第一段〜) December 24, 1999(1999-12-24)
transformers_text: 13 The Blood Rain of the One Hundred Foxes of Shin shu Part III Japanese December 24 1999 1999 12 24 Sakon holds a sean ce with Uk on where K you ichi's voice appears to reveal that he is dead and buried near flowers A family friend Oki Katsumi reveals himself as the killer when he tries to dig up K you ichi's body Katsumi attacks with the By akko sword but breaks it on a stone fox statue and he is killed by the broken blade
tf_idf_text: blood rain one hundred fox shin shu part japanese december sakon hold sean ichis voice appear reveal dead bury near flower family friend oki katsumi reveals killer try dig ichis body katsumi attack akko sword break stone fox statue kill broken blade
